name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.232.1
- Optional dependency crash fix

v1.232.0
- Added 24 new cards!
- Added (some) Chinese (Simplified) support (添加（一些）中文（简体）支持)
- Many unlisted changes
- Added new artwork for character, character select button, and select screen BG
- Various balancing changes
- Completely changed how random buffs work - now each battle you have a small set of random buffs that your cards will pull from. The set changes each battle, and the number of turns for each applied random buff is still chosen semi-randomly
- Many bug fixes


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
credits:
Thanks to Gremious for his amazing work with both the Default Mod base, as well as the Archetype API. 
Big shoutout to Playmaker for various art contributions:
notably his character button, selection screen art, and the new Yugi character model!
